means: 抛弃，遗弃（情人）( jilt的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: Driven to distraction, he murdered the woman who jilted him.
sentence.Network_cn: 他被逼得发狂，于是杀死了抛弃他的那个女人。

sentence.Network_en: Police want to interview her jilted lover.
sentence.Network_cn: 警方想找那个被她抛弃的情人来问话。

sentence.Network_en: When he lost his money she jilted him.
sentence.Network_cn: 当他破产以后她便抛弃了他.

PerfectNetExp.abs: as everybody in our small town knew , the worst of all fates befallen Miss Caroline . she had been jilted .小镇里人人都知道，卡洛琳小姐遭遇了厄运，她被人抛弃了。
jilted woman vowed to take revenge on her former lover ., 那位被抛弃的女人发誓要报复她的前任情人.
i can hear it like a jilted crowd ., 我能听到它像一群被抛弃的众人.

list.abs: jilt的翻译中文意思... ... jilt 抛弃情人的女子 jilt (女子)任意遗弃(情人) from Middle English * see gill 4 现代英汉词典.
... 生意兴隆 Business flourishes 失恋 be disappointed in love;be jilted 甩卖 clearance sale;be on sale.
光影久久资料库 - 影片列表 ... 白蔷薇的悲哀 Forget me not 负心的人 The jilted 爱情集中营 Love storys.

entry.def: If someone is jilted, the person they are having a romantic relationship with suddenly ends the relationship in a surprising and upsetting way.

example.ex: She was jilted by her first fiancé.
example.tran: 她被她第一个未婚夫甩了。

example.ex: Driven to distraction, he murdered the woman who jilted him...
example.tran: 他被逼得发狂，于是杀死了抛弃他的那个女人。

auth_sentence.content: But Fortune shook her swift wings and jilted him too.
auth_sentence.res_content: But Fortune shook her swift wings and jilted him too.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But Fortune shook her swift wings and jilted him too.

auth_sentence.content: Instead, he slaps at the ocean with jilted fury.
auth_sentence.res_content: Instead, he slaps at the ocean with jilted fury.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Instead, he slaps at the ocean with jilted fury.

auth_sentence.content: Oh, and there was an acoustic version of The Prodigy's Music for the Jilted Generation, plus tributes to Kylie Minogue, Snap!
